name: Moular
content: Moular was a male of a species and a member of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. He was also cousins to Halorum who sent him to assist Commander Luke Skywalker and Princess Leia Organa escape the planet Banas, during the Galactic Civil War. He provided a starship to help them escape, while also taking on the rebel cause himself. Moular was close to the activities of the Galactic Empire and was tasked with remaining in contact with the Rebel Alliance.
